Skill.source: Item:22:Mark of the Elder, Steel Ring

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
https://www.pathofexile.com/forum/view-thread/2081371
- Be sure to add the following to the Flask for even more higher DPS ----------------------------- Diamond Flask Crafted: true Prefix: None Suffix: None Quality: 20 LevelReq: 27 Implicits: 0 44% more melee attack speed 30% less attack damage 10% increased melee physical damage 50% more damage MULTISTRIKE WORKAROUND
- Add the: Charisma, Reduced Mana Reservation and Aura Area of Effect
Major: Soul of Solaris or Lunaris - I usually use Solaris Minor: Soul of Gruthkul is the one I use the most.
When it comes to pantheons, I want it to be said though, that they can be highly situational. In 3.9 I played with Soul of Shakari a lot since chaos damage was such a big deal. In blight maps Soul of Abberath is really good to avoid getting killed by burning ground.
Rare Jewel Crafting
Prefix: % Maximum Life Crit Multiplier with One-handed Melee Weapons Crit Multiplier with Cold Skills Attackspeed % Damage rolls. (Cold or Phys)
Suffix: Melee Critical Strike Multiplier Critical Strike Multiplier with Elemental Skills Global Critical Strike Multiplier Attack speed / Damage
Abyss Prefix: +# to Maximum life Claw cold damage Claw phys dmg
Abyss Suffix: Cold damage Crit multiplier Attack Speed
